授業目的: Each student is expected to work on advisor-approved projects that will challenge the student to learn about new digital technologies and use those technologies to affect our digital society positively. This year, some of those technologies include: 1) Generative AI (text, images, audio, and video), such as ChatGPT, Bert, Claude, Llama, Huggingface, etc. 2) Computer graphics, (3D modeling, game design & development), 3) 3D character animation (Blender, Maya, etc), 4) social networking apps (for Facebook, Mixi, etc), 5) educational technologies (Moodle, task-based language teaching, etc), 6) blockchain and other distributed-ledger technologies,
到達目標: Students will: 1) Work on advisor-directed research projects 2) Learn useful research techniques based on the scientific method 3) Work on groups of 2 or more to develop their research themes more efficiently 4) Write academic papers using standard writing tools 5) Programming skills 6) Surveying skills
授業の概要・背景: This is a practical class that teaches how to select research themes for your senior thesis and graduation thesis. In the first year, students will learn mainly about selecting a senior thesis research topic, organizing the topic, selecting team members for team projects, making presentations, and planning research goals and success indicators. In the second year, students are expected to realize a graduation thesis research project as a follow-up to the first year. In the first year, students are required to submit written work, but in the second year, students will either submit a graduation thesis or submit the actual results of their research as digital data. For example, games, music tracks, animations, web services, etc.
授業方法:
Requires student presentations and individual and team projects.
In essence, the class format is face-to-face, but for students who have permission for online classes, the class will be taught in a simultaneous interactive online format. All classes are recorded via Zoom and can be viewed later on the Luna

site
.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Learn about current technologies you are interested on the web, newspapers and magazines, and keep up to date by looking up the technology news regularly

Learn about current technologies that interest you from the web, newspapers, and magazines, and regularly check technology news to stay up to date.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
Each subject is placed on the curriculum based on the Diploma Policy (DP) and Curriculum Policy (CP) established by each faculty and graduate school.
By studying this subject with the DP and CP in mind, you will develop the abilities expected by each faculty and graduate school.
The DP, CP and curriculum table (list of subjects, etc.) of each faculty and graduate school are posted in the link below, so please use it as a reference for your study plan.
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
*This is a link to kwic (only current students can view it)
